summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of Fourteenth Avenue and Fourteenth Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, from East Fir Street to Washington Street, and providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the ascertainment and payment of the just compensations to be made for the private property to betaken or damaged for said purpose, and for an assessment upon the property benefited for the purpose of making such compensation.
